scripts.test:php: npm run composer:test && npm run wp-env --debug start && npm run wp-env run phpunit 'phpunit -c /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/wsform-login/phpunit.xml.dist'
scripts.test:e2e: npm run composer:test && npm run wp-env --debug start && npm run wp-env clean tests && npx cypress run --config video=false
